LanguageData.AF_Gun_AGBs41_Halt.label: <color=#b4f69d>AGBs-IceFox</color>
LanguageData.AF_Gun_AGBs41_Halt.description:
AGBs41，IceFox，It's one of the favorite Sydaily crystal weapons of the Ferian: Elegant design, small and lightweight at the same time to ensure that the effective killing of alien monsters！ 
【The Sydaily weapon has lost power. But it only needs to be replenished to be reused~】 

I can't use the Sydaily Blade or the computer, and even the sight has lost power. But with low power, you can shoot from any distance without blowing yourself up~ 
But the damage is still a little too much to bear...
